page.title: 19RELIGION IN M.W./SHIPT.
page.content: There are three places of worship - "St. John's Methodist Chapel", "All Saints" church which is the Parish Church of Market Weighton and "All Saints" church at Shiptonthorpe. Near "St. John's Chapel" is the original Methodist chapel built in l786 at which John Wesley preached in June l788. The Minister today is the Reverend K. Jarvis. The Reverends Exley and Sellers are the two vicars. The chapel and churches are well attended mainly by older people and married people with their young families. Great efforts have been made to attract more people by social activities connected with the place of worship such as Bible study, discussion groups and fellowship meetings.
